contentfulProduct.seoDescription: Expertly hand quilted and stonewashed for a naturally lived-in look and soft feel, our 100% cotton quilt is a classic style that is both refined and casual.  The cotton filling provides a mid-weight loft making it a perfect year-round layer. Set includes
contentfulProduct.title: Stonewashed Handcrafted Cotton Quilt Set

content.value: Expertly hand quilted and stonewashed for a naturally lived-in look and feel, our 100% cotton quilt is a classic style that is both refined and casual. The cotton filling provides a mid-weight loft making it a perfect year-round layer. Set includes quilt and two shams.
Mid-weight loft; best for year-round comfort
Set includes quilt and two shams - standard sham for full/queen and king sham for king/cal king

productDetails.productDetails:
• Hand quilted of 100% cotton
  • Filled with 100% cotton batting
  • Pre-washed for superior softness
  • Mid-weight loft; best for year-round comfort
  • Set includes quilt and two shams - standard sham for full/queen and king sham for king/cal king
  • Sham features envelope closure
  • Made with care in India

productDescription.productDescription: Expertly hand quilted and stonewashed for a naturally lived-in look and feel, our 100% cotton quilt is a classic style that is both refined and casual. The cotton filling provides a mid-weight loft making it a perfect year-round layer. Set includes quilt and two shams.

content.value: "Quinces new rug collection is hand knotted and tufted by artisans in India. Best of all, the prices are fairly reasonable for the top-notch quality youre getting."
"We've got you covered with this very affordable cashmere sweater that somehow clocks in at a miraculous 50buckeroos."
"New Online Fashion Brand Aims To Get Eco-Friendly Clothes From Factory-To-Closet At Affordable Prices."
"While D2C brands have changed the way we shop,
is looking to change retail even more dramatically."
"A cashmere crewneck for $50?! Its now a reality  in 10 colors  thanks to Quince."
"The brand connects with factories to selldirectto the customer, promising consumers better prices and factories with better margins."
"The Quince Organic Percale Luxe Sheet Set collection is an excellent choice for anyone who sleeps hot at night."
"You can get a cashmere sweater for only $50 from this radically transparent basics company."
"My next plane outfit when I can travel again."
